full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR GYI RGYAL MO MNYES PAR BYED PA'I GSER SKYEMS BDUD RTZI'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES SRID GSUM BDAG MO DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR GYI RGYAL MO MNYES PAR BYED PA'I GSER SKYEMS BDUD RTZI'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ` RGYAL KUN MKHYEN BRTZE NUS GSUM GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I BDAG NYID 'PHAGS MCHOG PHYAG NA PADMA NGUR SMRIG GAR GYIS RNAM PAR ROL PA ^RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN CING GZIGS PA CHEN PO ^RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS BKA' STZAL BA SPYI BOR NOS TE, ^ SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR NAS PHUL BA'O,, ,,)
